description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2020-Jun-15 08:03:33

SessionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented on the start of a drive session. This ID uniquely defines a drive session for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events.

LiftSequenceNumber.description: Units: Count. A count of the number of load registered events throughout this drive session, indicating the sequence of loads lifted. Count resets to zero at the start of the drive session.

LadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset spent laden (carrying a load) over the duration of this summary event.

MovingLadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was laden while moving over the duration of this summary event.

WorkingLadenTime.description: Units: Seconds. Duration Asset was laden while working over the duration of this summary event.

LadenSustainTime.title: Laden Sustain Time
LadenSustainTime.description: Units: Seconds. Specifies the grace period while the current load is above the laden threshold before the system considers the truck laden.

UnladenSustainTime.title: Unladen Sustain Time
UnladenSustainTime.description: Units: Seconds. Specifies the grace period while the current load is below the unladen threshold before the system considers the truck no longer laden.

LadenThreshold.title: Laden Threshold
LadenThreshold.description: Units: Kg. Specifies the load threshold, where if the current load exceeds this threshold for longer than the specified 'laden sustain time' the system considers the asset / truck laden.

UnladenThreshold.title: Unladen Threshold
UnladenThreshold.description: Units: Kg. Specifies the load threshold, where if the current load dips below this threshold for longer than the specified 'unladen sustain time' the system considers the asset / truck no longer laden.

OperatorId.description: ID of operator currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

FacilityCode.description: ID embedded in operator access card, normally referred to as site or facility code. Helps to determine which operator is currently logged onto the asset / telemetry device.

LadenLoadWeight.description: Units: Kg. Asset's Load Weight averaged over time spent laden for this individual load summary event

ContainerType.description: Units: Boolean. Type of Container asset is currently laden with.

GpsPositionId_LadenStart.description: Units: Count. A reference to the 'GPS Position ID' of a GPS position event captured at the start of a load summary event.

GpsPositionId.description: Units: Count. A lifetime counter incremented for every GPS position recorded/logged. This ID uniquely defines a GPS position for this telemetry device. The ID may be referenced by other events. The current value references the last logged GPS Position Event.

GpsLat.title: GPS Latitude
GpsLat.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the last / current GPS position. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong.title: GPS Longitude
GpsLong.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the last / current GPS position. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.

GpsLat_LadenStart.title: GPS Latitude Start
GpsLat_LadenStart.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Latitude of the position referenced at the start of a load summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative latitude indicates South. Positive indicates North.

GpsLong_LadenStart.title: GPS Longitude Start
GpsLong_LadenStart.description: Units: 10^-7 deg/bit. Indicates Longitude of the position referenced at the start of a load summary event. Sign indicates cardinal. Negative Longitude indicates West. Positive indicates East.
